file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 3.0.0
  title: FFAStrans REST API Version 3.0
paths:
  /hello:
    x-swagger-router-controller: hello_world
    get:
      description: Returns 'Hello' to the caller
      operationId: hello
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: The name of the person to whom to say hello
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/HelloWorldResponse"
        default:
          description: Error
          content:  # Response body
            application/json:  # Media type
              schema:          # Must-have
                type: object   # Data 
                properties: 
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  fullTime: 
                    type: boolean
                example:       # Sample data
                    id: 1
                    name: Jessica Right
                    fullTime: true
  /getjoblog:
    x-swagger-router-controller: get_job_log
    get:
      description: Gets an existing jobs log file contents
      operationId: get_job_log
      parameters:
        - name: jobid
          in: query
          description: A JobId, currently all branches of a job share the same jobid,
            getjoblog cannot determine which log line belongs to which branch
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
        default:
          description: Error
  /tickets:
    x-swagger-router-controller: tickets
    get:
      description: Gets active and pending jobs
      parameters:
        - name: nodetails
          in: query
          description: Reduces performance impact on database significally, only returns currently active jobid's. Excluded incoming (those are complex to get)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
      operationId: tickets
      responses:
        "200":
          description: List of Jobs
        default:
          description: Error
  /machines:
    x-swagger-router-controller: machines
    get:
      description: Gets List of Farm Machines
      operationId: machines
      responses:
        "200":
          description: List of Machines and config
        default:
          description: Error   
  /metrics:
    x-swagger-router-controller: metrics
    get:
      description: Gets Prometheus compatible Farm metrics
      operationId: metrics
      responses:
        "200":
          description: List of metrics
        default:
          description: Error 
  /getjobdetails:
    x-swagger-router-controller: get_job_details
    get:
      description: Get all available details about an existing job
      operationId: get_job_details
      parameters:
        - name: jobid
          in: query
          description: A JobId, currently all branches of a job share the same jobid,
            getjoblog cannot determine which log line belongs to which branch
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
        default:
          description: Error
  /getmediainfo:
    x-swagger-router-controller: get_mediainfo
    get:
      description: Get mediainfo about a file 
      operationId: get_mediainfo
      parameters:
        - name: filepath
          in: query
          description: The path to a file from perspective of the API server
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
        default:
          description: Error
  /swagger:
    x-swagger-pipe: swagger_raw
servers:
  - url: /

components:
  schemas:
    HelloWorldResponse:
      required:
        - message
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
    ErrorResponse:
      required:
        - message
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
